sql.query:
SELECT w.*, s.firstName, s.lastName
FROM waitlists AS w
LEFT JOIN students AS s ON (s.uuid = w.student_uuid)
WHERE w.status = :P1 /* {{$_GET.status?$_GET.status:'waiting'}} */ AND w.student_uuid = :P2 /* {{$_GET.student_uuid}} */

SELECT *
FROM classes
WHERE (instructor_uuid = :P1 /* {{instructor_uuid}} */) AND (startTimeDecimal >= :P2 /* {{starttimedec}} */ AND startTimeDecimal <= :P3 /* {{endtimedec}} */) AND (classlevel_uuid = :P4 /* {{classlevel_uuid}} */) AND day = :P5 /* {{dayint}} */
